an7.78:1.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu vinayadharo hoti.
an7.78:1.7: anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati, seyyathidam—ekampi jatim, dvepi jatiyo …pe… iti sakaram sauddesam anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati.
an7.78:1.8: Dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena yathakammupage satte pajanati.
an7.78:1.9: Asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an7.78:1.10: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu vinayadharo hoti”ti.
